flashcards.front: Who sang the song, "A Hard Day's Night"?
Who sang, "Then one day you find, ten years have got behind you. No one told you when to run, you missed the starting gun."?

flashcards.fullText: All lies and jest, still, a man hears what he wants to hear and disregards the rest.
flashcards.partialText: All lies and jest, still, a man hears what he wants to hear and ....
